title: Job Vacancies at TV Deluxe Global
content:
TV Deluxe Global is a Nigeria-based company offering a wide range of tailored operational services. They focus on supply chain management, e-commerce, logistics, safety consultancy, agriculture, and last-mile delivery, delivering bespoke business solutions with a global perspective and local expertise.

We are recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Digital Marketing Specialist

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly creative, results-driven Digital Marketing Executive to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, tracking, and optimizing digital marketing campaigns across various digital channels to drive brand awareness, customer engagement, and business growth.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute effective digital marketing strategies across social media, email, SEO/SEM, and paid advertising channels.
	Manage the company’s online presence and ensure brand consistency across platforms.
	Plan, create, and publish engaging content (graphics, videos, blog posts).
	Monitor, analyze, and report on digital campaign performance using analytics tools.
	Drive lead generation efforts and optimize conversion funnels.
	Conduct market research to identify trends, audiences, and growth opportunities.
	Collaborate with internal teams to enhance marketing initiatives and campaigns.
	Manage and optimize company website content and structure.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field.
	Proven experience (2–4 years) in digital marketing, preferably in a fast-paced environment.
	Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, Google Analytics, Meta Ads, and email marketing tools.
	Demonstrated ability to create compelling content and manage social media platforms.
	Excellent communication, analytical, and project management skills.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.


Preferred Skills:


	Experience with Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or video editing tools.
	Knowledge of CRM systems and marketing automation tools.
	Certifications in digital marketing (Google, HubSpot, Meta, etc.) are an added advantage.


Why Join Us?


	Salary: N170,000 - N350,000 / month.
	Competitive salary and benefits
	Opportunity for growth and career development
	Dynamic and supportive work environment
	Exposure to exciting digital projects across diverse industries


Application Closing Date: 20th December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, portfolio, and links to past work to: darinze@tvdeluxeglobal.com using “Digital Marketing Executive” as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Business Development Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a results-driven and strategic Business Development Executive to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building strong client relationships, and driving revenue growth in alignment with the company’s objectives.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities through market research, networking, and lead generation.
	Develop and maintain productive relationships with existing and prospective clients.
	Prepare and deliver persuasive business proposals, presentations, and pitches.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Marketing, Finance, and Operations) to ensure client satisfaction and project delivery.
	Track and analyze sales performance metrics to identify areas for improvement.
	Participate in strategic planning sessions to support business expansion and market penetration.
	Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or a related field.
	3–5 years of experience in business development, sales, or account management (preferably within Logistics).
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong presentation and proposal writing skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and CRM tools.
	Self-motivated, target-oriented, and able to work independently.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N190,000 Monthly.
	Career growth and development opportunities.
	A dynamic and collaborative work environment.


Application Closing Date: 15th December, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: darinze@tvdeluxeglobal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email

 

 

3.) Human Resources Manager

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	The Human Resources Manager will oversee the day-to-day operations of the HR department, ensuring the effective management of the company’s human capital.
	The role involves strategic planning, recruitment, performance management, employee relations, compliance, and fostering a productive and engaging workplace culture aligned with organizational goals.


Key Responsibilities
Recruitment & Onboarding:


	Lead end-to-end recruitment, selection, and placement processes for all roles.
	Develop and implement effective onboarding and orientation programs for new hires.
	Maintain a talent pipeline and succession planning framework.


Performance Management:


	Design and oversee the company’s performance management and appraisal systems.
	Support departmental heads in setting measurable KPIs and evaluating performance outcomes.
	Recommend performance improvement or reward strategies based on evaluation results.


Employee Relations:


	Serve as the primary contact for employee inquiries, grievances, and conflict resolution.
	Promote a positive and compliant work environment in line with company values and labor laws.
	Manage disciplinary procedures and ensure fairness and documentation in all employee actions.


Learning & Development:


	Identify training and development needs across departments.
	Organize and evaluate training programs to enhance employee capability and productivity.
	Support career development and growth initiatives.


Policy & Compliance:


	Develop, review, and implement HR policies and procedures in line with best practices and statutory requirements.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, employee welfare regulations, and organizational standards.
	Maintain accurate employee records and HR documentation.


Compensation & Benefits:


	Oversee payroll preparation and ensure timely, accurate processing.
	Manage employee benefits, leave administration, and other welfare programs.
	Advise management on compensation benchmarking and reviews.


HR Strategy & Reporting:


	Contribute to strategic workforce planning and organizational development initiatives.
	Provide HR analytics, reports, and insights to guide management decisions.
	Drive employee engagement and retention strategies.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 8- 15 years of relevant HR experience, with at least 3 years in a supervisory or managerial role.
	Professional certification (e.g., CIPM, SHRM, or equivalent) is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills.
	Proficiency in HR software and Microsoft Office Suite.


Key Competencies:


	Strategic thinking and decision-making
	Emotional intelligence and people management
	Conflict resolution and negotiation
	Attention to detail and confidentiality
	Organizational and analytical skills.


Salary
N400,000 - N600,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 21st December, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: darinze@tvdeluxeglobal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
